rooms.description: spacious entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade for natural light. Vastu compliant positioning with the main entrance facing east.
open-plan living area featuring minimalist decor and floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural lighting. Adjacent to dining area.
integrated with the living room, optimized for social gatherings while ensuring sufficient daylight through adjoining large windows.

designed as a compact yet functional space with minimalist aesthetics. Includes floor-to-ceiling glass panels for improved natural lighting and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles by placing the kitchen in the southeast area.
small utility bathroom located conveniently near the entrance for guests. Minimalist design and adequate ventilation.
comfortably sized guest room with a minimalist interior and ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu compliant orientation is maintained.

openings.description: double door entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows above for natural illumination. Complies with local building norms and Vastu by facing the east.
secondary access point for service and maintenance purposes. Minimalist design.
emergency exit window designed with floor-to-ceiling features to maximize natural light and adhere to safety norms.

rooms.description: expansive master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light. En-suite bathroom integrated within the space for privacy.
secondary bedroom designed in a minimalist style with ample storage and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting.
additional bedroom following similar minimalist aesthetics. Floor-to-ceiling glass ensures a bright interior.

openings.description: secure and accessible staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor. Minimalist design with integrated lighting.

rooms.description: quiet study or home office space with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light. Minimalist design and ample storage.
additional bedroom following minimalist principles with sufficient natural lighting via floor-to-ceiling windows.

openings.description: staircase connecting the first floor to the second floor. Designed with minimalist features and adequate lighting.

rooms.description: expansive terrace featuring a swimming pool designed in minimalist style with floor-to-ceiling windows on surrounding walls to maximize natural light and view of the garden.

openings.description: designated access point from the terrace to the swimming pool area. Minimalist design and functional layout.
